decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive strategies, utilizing low-cost and efficient creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The goal is to apply consistent pressure to the opponent and finish the game as quickly as possible. The deck includes a variety of direct damage spells, efficient creatures with haste, and cards that punish the opponent for playing spells. By utilizing Zurgo Bellstriker as the commander, the deck can take advantage of his aggressive abilities and abilities to repeatedly deal damage to the opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast and relentless aggression, forcing them to react quickly or risk being overwhelmed.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through countering spells, removing threats, and card advantage. By combining efficient removal spells like Path to Exile and Swords to Plowshares with powerful counterspells like Counterspell and Dovin's Veto, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its own threats. Card draw spells like Fact or Fiction and Serum Visions help ensure a steady stream of resources, while powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Jace, Unraveler of Secrets provide additional card advantage and control elements. The deck also includes versatile board wipes like Wrath of God and Supreme Verdict to deal with wide board states. The goal is to outvalue and outlast the opponent until victory is secured.

The deck is focused on aggressive gameplay with the commander Cloud, Midgar Mercenary leading the charge. The main deck includes a mix of creatures, removal spells, and equipment to control the battlefield and deal damage quickly to the opponent. With a heavy emphasis on white mana, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression while maintaining board presence through efficient creatures and disruption. The inclusion of cards like Swords to Plowshares, Skyclave Apparition, and Puresteel Paladin provide removal and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent. The deck's strategy revolves around building a strong board state and quickly closing out the game with powerful attacks.

The deck focuses on controlling the board with a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and bounce effects while gradually developing its own board presence. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its key creatures like Plagon, Lord of the Beach, and True-Name Nemesis. The deck also utilizes flicker effects to generate value from enter-the-battlefield abilities and protect important creatures from removal. It has a strong tempo game plan, leveraging disruptive spells like Force Spike and Mana Tithe to keep opponents off balance while slowly building up its own advantage. The deck's strategy revolves around outmaneuvering opponents and overwhelming them with efficient threats.

The deck revolves around utilizing the legendary creature Deadpool, Trading Card as the commander to build a fast-paced aggressive strategy. The deck includes a mix of powerful removal spells, efficient creatures, and burn spells to put pressure on the opponent quickly. With a solid mana base and a variety of versatile cards like Duress, Lightning Bolt, and Fatal Push, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while presenting threats that can end the game swiftly. The goal is to maintain board control, deal direct damage, and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The strategy is focused on being proactive, aggressively advancing the game state, and closing out the game before the opponent can establish a strong defense.

The Golos, Tireless Pilgrim deck focuses on utilizing a variety of ramp and control elements to establish board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With Golos as the commander, the deck includes a mix of removal spells, land search cards, and versatile creatures to control the game. The main win condition revolves around utilizing Golos's ability to fetch Maze's End and activate its win condition. The deck also includes a wide array of gates to support this strategy, along with other versatile lands that can provide additional benefits. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through a combination of control elements, powerful creatures, and a unique win condition utilizing lands.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive strategy using a combination of creatures and spells. With Grist, the Hunger Tide as the commander, the deck aims to generate value through sacrificing creatures and utilizing the graveyard effectively. The deck runs a mix of mana dorks, removal spells, and powerful creatures to apply pressure on the opponent and maintain board presence. With a strong mana base and a variety of card draw and tutoring effects, the deck is able to consistently execute its game plan and adapt to different situations. Overall, the deck is designed to be fast-paced and proactive, aiming to close out games quickly by overwhelming the opponent with a steady stream of threats.

This deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting opponents with counterspells, bounce spells, and stealing or copying their key cards. It aims to protect its commander, Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel, who generates Treasure tokens to ramp and maintain card advantage. By efficiently countering threats and drawing cards, the deck aims to outvalue opponents and maintain tempo. The inclusion of cards like True-Name Nemesis, Hullbreacher, and Vedalken Shackles allows for stealing or copying opponents' creatures to further control the game. Additionally, the deck can win through evasive creatures like Sea-Dasher Octopus and Cryptic Command for additional value. Overall, the deck is designed to disrupt opponents while maintaining a strong board presence to secure victory.
